name.description: The assigned name of the pool. The possible values are vmac, vwwn, vsn or ipv4.

poolType.description: The assigned type of the pool. The possible values are vmac, vwwn, vsn or ipv4.

totalCount.description: Total count of IDs managed by this pool. Adding or removing ranges alters the totalCount

freeCount.description: Count of free IDs currently in this pool

allocatedCount.description: Count of IDs currently allocated from the pool

prefix.description: Prefix to be used in front of the generated IDs. An example would the vsn pool

rangeUris.description: List of ID Ranges contained within this pool

enabled.description: Defines the status of the pool

description: Defines a Pool resource. Allowed values are vmac,vsn,vwwn,ipv4,ipv6.
